text: Master Ernest Antwi Nyarko, known as Ernest Antwi or Ernest Nyarko (born 9 September 1995) is a Ghanaian football player who plays for FC Lviv.https://442gh.com/ghanaian-international-antwi-ernest-on-target-for- tajikistan-side-vahdat-fc/ ==Club career== He made his professional debut in the Segunda Liga for Desportivo das Aves on 8 August 2015 in a game against Sporting Covilhã. In July 2017, Antwi went on trial with Russian Premier League side FC Rostov. ==References== ==External links== Category:1995 births Category:Sportspeople from Accra Category:Living people Category:Ghanaian footballers Category:Tudu Mighty Jets FC players Category:Ghanaian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Portugal Category:Ghanaian expatriate sportspeople in Portugal Category:Ukrainian Premier League players Category:Expatriate footballers in Ukraine Category:Ghanaian expatriate sportspeople in Ukraine Category:S.C.
